issue.title: [C++] Don't install jni_util.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17163](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17163). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-17086 fixed some compiler warnings and restored the installation of jni_util.h to match prior behavior. But we never intended to expose this header, and the downstream Gluten project [no longer depends on it](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13614#issuecomment-1191198106), so we can stop installing it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17163?focusedCommentId=17569688) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13675
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13675>
